channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury yields rise ahead of PPI report
item.description: Bond yields rose early Friday ahead of another inflation report that could influence Federal Reserve interest-rate expectations.

item.title: DeepMind’s Michelangelo benchmark reveals limitations of long-context LLMs
item.description: LLMs can retrieve disparate facts from their context windows, but when it comes to reasoning over their context, they struggle badly.

item.title: ‘As his power of attorney, she had access to his emergency fund’: My mother-in-law stole thousands of dollars from my husband. What now?
item.description: “When she stopped working years ago she cared for her own father, who contributed to her home expenses.”

item.title: New high quality AI video generator Pyramid Flow launches — and it’s fully open source!
item.description: Pyramid Flow is released under the MIT License. This license allows for a wide range of uses, including commercial applications.
